post_title: WTB: t206 Era Cigarette Packs/Cartons/Tins - Piedmont/Sweet Caporal/Polar Bear etc.
post_content: Looking to buy cigarette packs, cartons, or various similarly themed items from around the time t206s were produced. I will take a look at anything that someone believes I may find interesting (all conditions). My email is [url]ccarrano@fordham.edu[/url]. Appreciate all offers!
